name: Cruzin Crusaders
description:
A short and difficult platformer made for the black thorn prod jam. The theme of this jam was more is less, so I made upgrades work against you.

wad to move, you can also use space to jump if you wish to.

WARNING

don't use the stop function in the browser function since it will crash the embed instead of closing graciously for some reason.

credits,

all art code and sfx is made by me.

tools,

unity, gimp, sfxr, visual studio
